text: 13.25 Mat 3.11, Mak 1.7, Luk 3.16, Jon 1.20-27 Pen Jon binɨb okok kɨlop God takaw agñɨ dad amɨl, kɨdek ñɨn olap agnɨŋɨd agak, Nɨbi yɨp an agɨl gos nepɨm agak? Bɨawl pel kod mɨdobun ak nɨm, owup agɨl nepɨm agak? Yad bɨawl yɨbɨl anɨb ak mel, ne kɨdek ownɨgab agak. Nop nɨgen yɨp nebeŋ gup, tob tɨlup nop nag ma wɨsɨkɨnɨgayn agak.
